title: How to Get a Phoenix in Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas

steps.title: Go to "Wang Cars" in Downtown San Fierro.
steps.content: Go to "Wang Cars" in Downtown San Fierro.

steps.title: Go behind Wang Cars and go on the red circle.
steps.content: Go behind Wang Cars and go on the red circle. Choose the he that race shown below.

steps.title: Enter the race then go back to Wang's.
steps.content: Enter the race then go back to Wang's.

steps.title: Go back to the place you started.
steps.content: Go back to the place you started. Get out of the car and wait until the time finishes and you fail the race.

steps.title: Customize your Phoenix and enjoy your new rare car.
steps.content: Customize your Phoenix and enjoy your new rare car.
